message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a special introductory price of $130.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for what it offers!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the item, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. Would you consider accepting this price?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints but I can't let it go for that low.  Could you meet me halfway at $115?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Given my budget, I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your asking price.
